lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Recent estimates put these costs at 4.0 billion European Currency Units and by 1990 they would rise by another 2.0 billion Ecus, he said.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Norbert Tanghe, head of division of the Commission's Directorate General for Agriculture, told the 8th Antwerp Oils and Fats Contact Days "the Commission firmly believes that the sacrifices which would be undergone by Community producers in the oils and fats sector ...

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: The proposed system would not alter the EC nations' requirements as far as imports are concerned since the overall effect would stabilise Community production levels without affecting demand, he said.

lst.name: sentence
